'''"Pour la Justice"''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[La Lettre a Focalors]] with [[Furina]]. The [[recipe]] for La Lettre a Focalors is obtainable from [[Arouet]] in [[Café Lutece]] for 5.000  Mora.

Pour la Justice increases all party members' Max [[HP]] by '''30'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
